name: K70 RGB MK.2
description: The Corsair K70 RGB MK.2 is a premium mechanical gaming keyboard built to last. It features Cherry MX Red key switches, dynamic per-key RGB lighting, and dedicated media controls. Ideal for gamers who need fast response times.

name: Huntsman V2
description: The Razer Huntsman V2 uses advanced optical switches for faster actuation and unparalleled gaming performance. Its key stabilization and build quality make it a perfect choice for esports enthusiasts.

name: G Pro X
description: Logitech’s G Pro X features swappable mechanical switches, offering customizability for a tailored gaming experience. Built for competitive play with a compact design and detachable cable.

name: Ducky One 2 Mini
description: The Ducky One 2 Mini is a 60% mechanical keyboard with a sleek design and customizable RGB lighting. It’s equipped with Cherry MX Brown switches, making it a perfect choice for both typing and gaming.

name: Anne Pro 2
description: The Anne Pro 2 is a wireless mechanical keyboard known for its compact 60% layout and versatile Bluetooth connectivity. Featuring Gateron Red switches, it provides a smooth and quiet typing experience.

name: SteelSeries Apex Pro
description: The Apex Pro is equipped with revolutionary OmniPoint adjustable switches, allowing you to customize actuation points for each key. It is a high-performance keyboard with unmatched durability and RGB lighting.
